title: Solutions
text: Thanks to the results of our collaboration, our client now has the leading ingredient transparency solution for the cosmetics industry.
To date, the app has analyzed more than 45,000 products and is highly rated by its users.

title: Sales increase
text: Now retailers can sell products more effectively based on consumers' specific personal needs, unique skin types, and so on. This solution empowers people to discover safe products that make them look and feel their best!
